blackbeard:LoadTheCannons.NAME: Load The Cannons
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, and then every 4 turns, add a Cannonball to your hand.

blackbeard:HipFlask.NAME: Hip Flask
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 Resistance.

blackbeard:BloodOrange.NAME: Blood Orange
blackbeard:BloodOrange.FLAVOR: This citrus seems to have an interesting power.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play 6 cards in the same turn, remove all of your Debuffs.

blackbeard:TreasureChest.NAME: Treasure Chest
blackbeard:TreasureChest.FLAVOR: This treasure chest contains untold riches.

blackbeard:WhitePearl.NAME: White Pearl
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you Equip a Weapon, give it +1 Attack.

blackbeard:CannonballsOfSteel.NAME: Cannonballs Of Steel
DESCRIPTIONS: Your Cannonballs deal #b2 more damage. (Works with every type of Cannonball.)

blackbeard:GoldenRing.NAME: Golden Ring
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Artifact.

blackbeard:MagicalCauldron.NAME: Magical Cauldron
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, obtain a random potion.

blackbeard:Penknife.NAME: Penknife
blackbeard:Penknife.FLAVOR: If you have it in your pocket, don't forget to use it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 8th Attack that uses at least one Weapon deals double damage.

blackbeard:PoorMathSkills.NAME: Poor Math Skills
blackbeard:PoorMathSkills.FLAVOR: Sometimes failing a math class is a good thing.
DESCRIPTIONS: You think that you have gained #y500 more Gold this run than you actually did. (It matters for cards that scale with Gold gained this run.)

blackbeard:PowderCan.NAME: Powder Can
blackbeard:PowderCan.FLAVOR: Just like a Powder Keg, but smaller.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, equip a 0 / 1 Weapon. When it is destroyed, deal 8 damage to ALL enemies.

blackbeard:Soberminded.NAME: Sober-minded
blackbeard:Soberminded.FLAVOR: Being sober is not a natural state for The Blackbeard.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of each combat, lose 1 Resistance.

blackbeard:Spearhead.NAME: Spearhead
blackbeard:Spearhead.FLAVOR: The durability of your Weapon ends... and so does the life of your enemy.
DESCRIPTIONS: If a Weapon has 1 Durability, it deals 3 more damage.

blackbeard:CrossedSwords.NAME: Crossed Swords
DESCRIPTIONS: Your attacks use an additional Weapon.
